text: Explore this project to understand the objective. Then, when you are ready I need your help to fix an issue I have got when I try to save a Strategy. I receive the error : "Strategy has validation errors. Please fix the issues and try again". Is it really an issue coming from the code or is it related to UI ? Here is a screenshot of the screen [Capture d’écran 2025-12-14 à 15.20.38.png 2732x538]
Yes please tweak the UI to show the specific validation errors in the banner.
Sorry but I have deleted all your previous changes. Please redo it once again.

When I try to display trades on a backtest run, I got an error "Failed to retrieve trades data". Here is a screenshot of the issue [Capture d’écran 2025-12-16 à 21.14.26.png 2620x1814] . Fix this issue please.
